verbs.description: [ARG0: Tillerson] [V: took] [ARG1: a veiled shot at President Donald Trump warning that a growing national crisis of ethics and integrity has put American democracy at risk] .
[ARG0: Tillerson] took a veiled shot at President Donald Trump [V: warning] [ARG1: that a growing national crisis of ethics and integrity has put American democracy at risk] .
Tillerson took a veiled shot at President Donald Trump warning that a [V: growing] [ARG1: national crisis] of ethics and integrity has put American democracy at risk .
Tillerson took a veiled shot at President Donald Trump warning that a growing national crisis of ethics and integrity [V: has] put American democracy at risk .
Tillerson took a veiled shot at President Donald Trump warning that [ARG0: a growing national crisis of ethics and integrity] has [V: put] [ARG1: American democracy] [ARG2: at risk] .
